calculators.title: Loan Amortization Calculator
calculators.description: View a complete loan payoff schedule with detailed breakdown of principal and interest payments over time. Visualize your loan amortization schedule.
calculators.seoTitle: Free Loan Amortization Calculator with Payment Schedule
calculators.seoDescription: Calculate your loan amortization schedule with our free calculator. See detailed monthly payments, principal, interest, and remaining balance.

calculators.title: Daily Calorie Calculator
calculators.description: Calculate your daily calorie needs based on age, gender, weight, height, and activity level. Get your TDEE (Total Daily Energy Expenditure) and personalized macros.
calculators.shortDescription: Calculate daily calorie needs and goals
calculators.seoTitle: Free Daily Calorie Calculator - TDEE & Macro Calculator
calculators.seoDescription: Calculate your daily calorie needs with our free TDEE calculator. Get personalized calorie targets for weight loss, maintenance, or muscle gain.

calculators.title: Compound Interest Calculator
calculators.description: Calculate compound interest and see how your money grows over time. Visualize the power of compounding with detailed year-by-year breakdown and interactive charts.
calculators.seoTitle: Free Compound Interest Calculator - Investment Growth Calculator
calculators.seoDescription: Calculate compound interest on your investments and savings. See how your money grows over time with our free compound interest calculator. Includes charts and year-by-year breakdown.

calculators.title: Retirement Income Calculator
calculators.description: Plan your retirement income and see how long your savings will last. Calculate sustainable withdrawal rates, account for inflation, and visualize your retirement portfolio over time.
calculators.seoTitle: Free Retirement Income Calculator - Withdrawal & Drawdown Planner
calculators.seoDescription: Calculate how long your retirement savings will last. Plan sustainable withdrawals with our free retirement income calculator. Includes 4% rule, inflation adjustments, and year-by-year breakdown.

calculators.title: Home Affordability Calculator
calculators.description: Calculate how much house you can afford based on income, debts, down payment, and interest rates. See your maximum home price and comfortable monthly payment.

calculators.seoDescription: Calculate how much house you can afford based on your income and debts. Get your maximum home price with our free calculator.

calculators.title: Auto Loan Calculator
calculators.description: Calculate your monthly car payment including principal, interest, trade-in value, down payment, sales tax, and fees. Compare different loan terms and see total interest paid.
calculators.seoTitle: Free Auto Loan Calculator - Car Payment Calculator
calculators.seoDescription: Calculate your monthly car payment with our free auto loan calculator. Include trade-in, down payment, taxes, and fees.

calculators.title: GPA Calculator
calculators.description: Calculate your cumulative GPA with weighted or unweighted grades. Add multiple courses with credit hours and letter grades to see your grade point average.
calculators.seoTitle: Free GPA Calculator - Grade Point Average Calculator
calculators.seoDescription: Calculate your GPA with multiple courses and credit hours. Track weighted and unweighted grades with our free calculator.

calculators.title: Business Days Calculator
calculators.description: Calculate business days between two dates excluding weekends and holidays. Add or subtract business days from a date for project planning and deadline tracking.

calculators.seoDescription: Calculate business days between dates excluding weekends and holidays. Plan project deadlines with our free calculator.
